channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla’s stock flirts with new high upon bold prediction for a $3 trillion valuation
item.description: While Tesla shares have pared gains, optimism is building for the company’s efforts in AI and autonomous driving.

item.title: ‘We all have economic jitters’: After the Fed cut rates, should my son buy a $600K house?
item.description: “They are tuned in to friends and colleagues, who are losing jobs, cognizant of shifts in company agendas and financial worries.”

item.title: Why ServiceNow’s stock just sank for its worst day in 11 months
item.description: The stock drop reflects concerns that ServiceNow could get more acquisitive in a bid to ignite growth.

item.title: Wall Street’s lone Nvidia bear is doubling down on his call, with high conviction
item.description: Seaport Research’s negative view of Nvidia’s stock hasn’t panned out thus far, but analyst Jay Goldberg is emphasizing the recommendation as he looks ...

item.title: Analyst takes ‘contrarian stance’ on Costco’s stock and says it’s time to sell
item.description: Slower membership trends, competition from Walmart and caution around starting a family all present risks to the big-box retailer, a Roth analyst said...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
